page.title: 01BREAN AND BREAN DOWN
page.content: DOMINATED FROM THE NORTH BY BREAN DOWN,THE SHALLOW,SANDY,WEST FACING BEACH AT BREAN IS BACKED BY SAND-DUNES AND BLEADON LEVEL. THE BEACH IS USED FOR SAND YACHTING AT REGIONAL,NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL LEVEL AND IS ALSO A REGULAR VENUE FOR BEACH FISHING.BEYOND THE SAND THERE ARE TRICKY MUD FLATS. BREAN DOWN WITH ITS VICTORIAN FORT, ANCIENT FIELD SYSTEM AND ROMAN TEMPLE SITE ATTRACTS ANTIQUARIANS AND NATURALISTS AS MANY UNUSUAL INSECTS, BIRDS AND PLANTS CAN BE SEEN. THE COASTAL ROAD IS FLANKED WITH ARAVAN SITES AND AN INCRERASING NUMBER OF PERMANENT HOMES.A BIRD GARDEN NESTLES UNDER THE DOWN AND IS OF SOME INTEREST.
